name: HELLEVATORS
description:
HELLEVATORS

Play as Satan’s HR department, operating HELLEVATORS to ensure damned souls can traverse the lobby and reach their allocated layer of hell.

  • Gain time when souls reach their portal.
  • Lose time if they don’t make it! A soul can only survive in the lobby for so long!
  • Souls will only move when they have a full path to their portal.

CONTROLS:

  • Click on two points in an elevator shaft to spawn an elevator.
  • Click the remove button at the top of an active shaft to drop the elevator out of play.
